xml:

  <block type="board" id="j6ui9I~2%~z8u:waCbrj" x="-62" y="-12">

    <statement name="callbacks_">
      <block type="get_weather" id="d30XugwmL[)p`c!~=Itr">
        <field name="type_">aqi</field>
        <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">取得氣象資料之後，才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
        <next>
          <block type="line_chat" id="Twj_12Fwi/DP*;j,*XO4">
            <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">右鍵選擇「教學」，加入 Webduino 為 LINE 好友開始聊天控制</comment>
            <value name="channel">
              <block type="text" id="h6l+,u^Eny0V[TeF1qc6">

              </block>
            </value>
            <statement name="do">
              <block type="controls_if" id="a/=;Fxpz{SmEOr!N?8vR">
                <mutation elseif="2"></mutation>
                <value name="IF0">
                  <block type="logic_compare" id="8c)L7o:uZl4ZVi62npYX">

                    <value name="A">
                      <block type="line_chat_msg" id="Q^!P=9P{w-BNndv`v*Q-"></block>
                    </value>
                    <value name="B">
                      <block type="text" id="IPtI:P}tEBIsK`9==B6z">
                        <field name="TEXT">黃</field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <statement name="DO0">
                  <block type="bit_matrix_color_output" id="BpZ8[}Q5P|2p+:#ofkC2">
                    <value name="color_input">
                      <block type="colour_picker" id="HzuUeD_QO/C:wBI`{wX~">
                        <field name="COLOUR">#ffff00</field>

                    </value>
                  </block>
                </statement>
                <value name="IF1">

                    <field name="OP">EQ</field>
                    <value name="A">
                      <block type="line_chat_msg" id="qqSB#=^q36je@-%mPgLQ"></block>
                    </value>
                    <value name="B">
                      <block type="text" id="Kg5?|meaB(W,|MJmO,:=">
                        <field name="TEXT">紅</field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                  </block>

                <statement name="DO1">
                  <block type="bit_matrix_color_output" id="4=dw1YB-QHd%ee~Natq6">

                    <value name="B">
                      <block type="text" id="s#H#fep)KWnpTwbn_TS|">
                        <field name="TEXT">PM</field>

                <statement name="DO2">
                  <block type="bit_matrix_string_once" id="]KsEKa+N46.qyg?nNydr">

                    <field name="speed_">2</field>
                    <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">若選擇一次，在跑馬燈結束後才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                    <value name="str_">
